content: ready to kiss under the mistletoe crochet a cute **mistletoe bouquet** with this free pattern and decorate your home for the holidays *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** aran 4 medium yarn 3 5-mm e/4 us 9 uk crochet hook 5 0-mm h/8 us 6 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yarn** for my mistletoe bouquet i used **green** paintbox yarns simply aran in slate green 226 **white** paintbox yarns simply aran in champagne white 202 **red** stylecraft special aran in lipstick 1246 feel free to use any yarn with the appropriate hook size **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
